clinical_study.brief_title: Obstetric Anaesthesia And Analgesia Month Attributes - International
clinical_study.official_title: A National Survey on Obstetric Anesthesia and Analgesia Care - International

collaborator.agency: Czech society of anesthesiology, resuscitation a intensive care - ČLS JEP

brief_summary.textblock: A national survey of current practices, preferred drug and technique choices for obstetric anesthesia and analgesia in Czech Republic and Slovak Republic.

detailed_description.textblock:
A one month-long project monitoring an obstetric anesthesia practices in obstetric/anesthesia departments throughout the Czech Republic.
Electronic Case Report Form (eCRF) is used to collect data on all obstetric anesthesia procedures in peripartal period and obstetric and anesthesia complications. All consecutive cases in each participating center during the study period are recorded. Each record is related to parturient and contains the following sections: history, form of labour analgesia, type of anesthesia for Cesarean section and anesthesia in third stage of labor.

primary_outcome.measure: A national survey of current practice of obstetric anesthesia and analgesia in Czech Republic and Slovak Republic
primary_outcome.time_frame: Parturition period, up to 24 hours after labor
primary_outcome.description: Monitoring of all obstetric anesthesia procedures in peripartal period and anesthesia complications: history, form of labour analgesia, type of anesthesia for Cesarean section and anesthesia in third stage of labor.

secondary_outcome.measure: Types of anesthesia a analgesia in peripartal period
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Parturition period, up to 24 hours after labor
secondary_outcome.description: To describe current practice a complications related to peripartal anesthesia care

other_outcome.measure: Complications related to obstetric anesthesia care
other_outcome.time_frame: Parturition period, up to 24 hours after labor
other_outcome.description: To describe current practice a complications related to peripartal anesthesia care

arm_group.arm_group_label: Women in labor undergoing anesthesia care
arm_group.description: Women in labor undergoing anesthesia care

intervention.description: All anesthesia procedures during labor: labor analgesia, anesthesia for Cesarean section, anesthesia for procedures in third stage of labor
intervention.arm_group_label: Women in labor undergoing anesthesia care
